options.content:
* requires specific `Instance` and `Hostname`
* supports additional filtering via `Comm`
* it displays only processes that were active in the last ${lookback_interval} sec (`lookback_interval` variable)
* `%CPU` column is the latest value
* `%Max` and `%Avg` are computed over the last ${lookback_interval} sec (`lookback_interval` variable)

panels.title: Top View For Instance=${instance}, Hostname=${hostname}, Comm=${comm}

options.content:
* requires specific `Comm` 
* supports additional filtering via `Instance` and `Hostname`
* `%CPU` column is the latest value
* `%Max` and `%Avg` are computed over the last ${lookback_interval} sec (`lookback_interval` variable)

targets.expr:
max_over_time(proc_pid_stat_pcpu{instance=~"${instance}", hostname=~"${hostname}", tid=""}[${lookback_interval}])
* on (instance, hostname, pid) (
    last_over_time(proc_pid_stat_comm{instance=~"${instance}", hostname=~"${hostname}", comm="${comm}",tid=""}[${full_cycle_interval}]) > 0
)

panels.title: Top View For Comm=${comm},  Instance=${instance}, Hostname=${hostname}

options.content:
* requires specific `Instance`, `Hostname` and `Comm`
* supports additional filtering via `PID` and `Threads`

targets.expr:
(last_over_time(proc_pid_stat_info{instance="${instance}", hostname="${hostname}", pid=~"${pid}"}[${full_cycle_interval}]) > 0)
* on (instance, hostname, pid) group_left(comm)
(last_over_time(proc_pid_stat_comm{instance="${instance}", hostname="${hostname}", comm="${comm}",  pid=~"${pid}", tid=""}[${full_cycle_interval}]) > 0)

(last_over_time(proc_pid_status_info{instance="${instance}", hostname="${hostname}", pid=~"${pid}"}[${full_cycle_interval}]) > 0)
* on (instance, hostname, pid) group_left(comm)
(last_over_time(proc_pid_stat_comm{instance="${instance}", hostname="${hostname}", comm="${comm}",  pid=~"${pid}", tid=""}[${full_cycle_interval}]) > 0)

panels.title: Process Info For Instance=${instance}, Hostname=${hostname}, Comm=${comm}, PID=${pid}

targets.expr:
(last_over_time(proc_pid_stat_prio{instance="${instance}", hostname="${hostname}", pid=~"${pid}", tid=~${threads}}[${full_cycle_interval}]) > 0)
* on (instance, hostname, pid) group_left(comm)
(last_over_time(proc_pid_stat_comm{instance="${instance}", hostname="${hostname}", comm="${comm}",  pid=~"${pid}", tid=""}[${full_cycle_interval}]) > 0)

panels.title: Process Priority For Instance=${instance}, Hostname=${hostname}, Comm=${comm}, PID=${pid}

targets.expr: {__name__=~"proc_pid_.*_count",instance=~"${instance}",hostname=~"${hostname}",part=~"${part}"}

list.description: Interval, in sec, for Max & Avg %CPU in Top View table.
list.name: lookback_interval

list.description: Full cycle metrics interval, in seconds.
list.name: full_cycle_interval
